name: cheese
description: A few crumbles of cheese that are useless to you but are a rat's favourite food.

name: apple
description: A delicious looking apple that you can `eat`.

name: torch
description: A piece of wood with some burning cloth and oil on top. You can `use` it to clear darkness.

name: chest
description: An old rotten chest that could hold something. You can easily `attack` and break it.

name: dagger
description: A small weapon that increases your strength in fights.

name: wolfskin
description: A small piece of armor that increases your strength and health.

name: lumber
description: Large pieces of wood bundled together. You can `use` it to repair some structure that is broken.

name: trash
description: Some useless piece of trash.

name: fish
description: Just some fish swimming in the strong currents best to let them be.

name: magical-fruit
description: A `magical-fruit` that you can `eat`

name: glass-case
description: On close inspection you see that the `glass-case` fits an `ornate-sword`. All you need to do is `remove` it from the `glass-case`.

name: ornate-sword
description: A magical weapon that increases your strength in fights significantly! Best to `take` it before someone else does.

name: mining-equipment
description: Some `mining-equipment` lying around. It looks like the owner left them here a long time ago. It should come in handy if you want to `use` it on something like `ore` or `rubble`.

name: notes
description: These are some sketches of a plan. You can oly make out some phrases in the bloodsoaked parchments like `return of the king`, `jailbreak` and `rebellion`.

name: inscriptions
description: The inscriptions show a map pointing the location of the ex `rebel-base`. It was an ideal location as it was close to `town` and also close to a secret entrace to the `palace` through the `sewer`!?

name: dead-partisan
description: The bloodsoaked body of a `dead-partisan`. It is a sad sight but it would be a good idea to look through his `inventory` and `remove` any important items from the body of the `dead-partisan`.

name: password
description: This is a `password` to enter the `rebel-base`! Who knows if they even exist anymore? Best to keep it with you till you have `use` of it.

name: dead-soldier
description: The bloodsoaked body of a `dead-soldier`. He has some heavy gear so it would be a good idea to look through his `inventory` and `remove` and any important items from the body of the `dead-soldier`.

name: heavy-armor
description: Some heavy platemail, breaches, steel boots and gloves. Equipping it increases the `strength` and `health` of its wearer.

name: gold-coins
description: Some gold-coins. Can buy you food or buy you information through a `bribe`.

name: old-paper
description: An `old-paper` that says a `1-trap-3` is `hidden-1` behind the `3-door`, `go` there! It looks like a crytpic message that leads you to aan area somewhere in this house. It would be a good idea to decode it and come up with a sensible name for an area to `go` to.

name: ornate-key
description: An `ornate-key` that you can `use` to open the `secret-door` leading to the palace.
